alert.note: Alert for Lower Yukon Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 06 at 8:44PM AKST until November 08 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM MONDAY TO NOON AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. Total ice accumulation less than one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Lower Yukon Valley. * WHEN...From 3 AM Monday to noon AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds and heavy snow with near blizzard conditions will move into the area tonight and will continue into Tuesday. Snow may mix with and then change to freezing rain Monday afternoon and evening. Expect very strong wind gusts to 65 mph to continue into Monday night.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
